title: Jocks: A Limited Edition New Adult Anthology
description: From slow burns to flames ablaze, these stories are sure to keep the pages turning! Athletes are driven, determined, and play to win in and out of uniform. A diverse collection of romances involving athletes from a variety of sports navigating school work, practice, and their hearts. Enemies to lovers, team rivals, rom-com, and so much more!Glacial Force by USA Today bestselling author Sofia AvesBruised Ego by USA Today Bestselling Author Amy StephensRoll with the Punches by Ivy PennBases Loaded by Hope KingstonTaking the Penalty by Poppy DouganHail Mary by Amanda CarolAzalea Blooms by Zoey DrakeCheertude by Breezy JonesHomecoming Queen by SL TorbettSidelined by Michele LenardFalling for Autumn by Emily CampTrick Play by Hazel GraceTo the Point by Amber AnthonyBrace and Dive by K.B. WheelockPower Play by Cedar RoseFifty Yard Line by Cara North
author: Cara North
